p: In the District Court of the 2d Judicial of Washington Territory holding terms at Olympia

In the matter of the application of Sam Tan for a writ of habeas corpus to the Honorable John Hoyt Judge of said Court. The petition of Sam Fang respectfully shows that he is unlawfully restrained of his liberty and imprisoned detained and confiend by William Billings Sheriff of Thurston County W.T. at Olympia Washington Territory. That said imprisonment detention confinement and restraint are illegal and that the illegality thereof consists of this to wit-: On the 22 day of April 1888 are Kang Jik made a complaint as statement in writing charging this petition with the crime of being
property committed to his alleged to be committed, at Thurston Count W.T. on or about the 20th April 1888 that charge the following is a true copy to wit-:
Territory of Washington County of Thurston} SS
